title: Beatriz Zimmermann Speaks About Daughters Olivia and Anna, Allegedly Dumped at Sea in Tenerife by Tomas Gimeno
content: Beatriz Zimmermann Speaks About Daughters Olivia and Anna, Allegedly Dumped at Sea in Tenerife by Tomas Gimeno  The Daily Beast
contentSnippet: Beatriz Zimmermann Speaks About Daughters Olivia and Anna, Allegedly Dumped at Sea in Tenerife by Tomas Gimeno  The Daily Beast

localize.title: テネリフェ島で海に捨てられたとされる娘のOliviaとAnnaについて語るBeatriz Zimmermann氏 by Tomas Gimeno
Beatriz Zimmermann谈论女儿Olivia和Anna，据称她们被Tomas Gimeno抛弃在特内里费岛的海上。
Beatriz Zimmermann談論女兒Olivia和Anna，據稱她們被Tomas Gimeno拋棄在特內里費島的海上。
